Articles.Content: Plz help. I tried downloading 1.0.2 from kerbalspaceprogram.com and it either starts and stops or starts and goes unbelievably slowly. I has a decent connection and can download whatever I want in a reasonable time from any other site so I'm not sure what's wrong. Is there a server issue atm or something?
Hi Norga, there is no server issue currently, can you please try another browser or a download accelerator plugin.

> 
> Hi Norga, there is no server issue currently, can you please try another browser or a download accelerator plugin.

I tried a different browser, but to no avail. Any ideas?
